Uses of Class
sage.scene.state.RenderStateRecord

  • Packages that use RenderStateRecord 
    Package Description
    sage.renderer  
    sage.scene.state  
    sage.scene.state.jogl  

    • Uses of RenderStateRecord in sage.renderer

      Methods in sage.renderer that return RenderStateRecord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderStateRecord RenderContext.getStateRecord(RenderState.RenderStateType type)
      Returns the RenderStateRecord of the given RenderState.RenderStateType from this RenderContext.

    • Uses of RenderStateRecord in sage.scene.state

      Subclasses of RenderStateRecord in sage.scene.state 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlendStateRecord
      * BlendStateRecord holds a record of the current BlendState values stored in a RenderContext.
      class  TextureRecord
      TextureRecord holds a record of the state of a Texture object.
      class  TextureStateRecord
      * TextureStateRecord holds a record of the current TextureState values stored in a RenderContext.
      class  TextureUnitRecord
      TextureUnitRecord represents the state of a texture unit in OpenGL.
      class  ZBufferStateRecord
      ZBufferStateRecord holds a record of the current ZBufferState values stored in a RenderContext.
      Methods in sage.scene.state that return RenderStateRecord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract RenderStateRecord RenderState.createStateRecord()
      This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to return a RenderStateRecord for the concrete RenderState type.

    • Uses of RenderStateRecord in sage.scene.state.jogl

      Methods in sage.scene.state.jogl that return RenderStateRecord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderStateRecord JOGLTextureState.createStateRecord()
